definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: And how to scale if the texture needs to be scaled down using the minification function.
sentences.chinese: 類似，在貼圖過多時，使用壓縮函數進行縮小。

sentences.english: Check to see if this object has a texture map, if so, bind the texture to it.
sentences.chinese: 檢查當前物體是否包括貼圖，如果有，邦定貼圖。

sentences.english: Check to see if this object has a texture map, if so, bind the texture to it.
sentences.chinese: 檢查當前物體是否包括貼圖，如果有，邦定貼圖。

sentences.english: To bring colour to this shape, texturing is required.
sentences.chinese: 要給這個形體上色，需要貼圖。

sentences.english: Draw textured with overlaid lightmap resolution grid.
sentences.chinese: 繪製帶有覆蓋光照貼圖分辨率網格紋理。

sentences.english: The texture projection maps the colors of the image to the geometry.
sentences.chinese: 紋理貼圖會把圖像的顏色直接投影在幾何體上。

sentences.english: Find out how users navigate your site via heat maps.
sentences.chinese: 找出用戶是如何經由熱貼圖瀏覽你的網站的。

sentences.english: Create this awesome looking spitfire in this Modeling and Texturing tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 本教程將爲創建好的野火式戰鬥機的貼圖。

sentences.english: I still haven't figured out the picture thing, but hope to soon.
sentences.chinese: 我還是沒有搞清楚如何貼圖，但希望快會了。

sentences.english: Bottom-most pixel position of the texture.
sentences.chinese: 貼圖的最下端像素位置。

sentences.english: Displacement map was created in ZBrush and photoshop.
sentences.chinese: 位移貼圖是在ZBrush和PS中創建的。

sentences.english: Pre-baked lighting in lieu of dynamic lighting, lets them push more on the texture side.
sentences.chinese: 預烘焙光源代替了動態光源，節省資源用在貼圖紋理。

sentences.english: This is necessary for normal mapping to work.
sentences.chinese: 這是法線貼圖運作時所必須的。

sentences.english: Fader is also a map of.
Left-most pixel position of the texture.
sentences.chinese: 貼圖的最左端像素位置。

sentences.english: Fixed broken graphics on the Dragons Horde wonder.
sentences.chinese: 修正龍穴奇蹟破損的貼圖。

definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
aggrieved/dejected/(Tw, southern China) to be moved by a kind gesture etc/to feel gratified/to feel warm inside
senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher
